code: import axios from"axios";import authHeader from"./auth-header";var API_URL="http://localhost:8080/api/test/";var getPublicContent=function getPublicContent(){return axios.get(API_URL+"all");};var getUserBoard=function getUserBoard(){return axios.get(API_URL+"user",{headers:authHeader()});};var getModeratorBoard=function getModeratorBoard(){return axios.get(API_URL+"mod",{headers:authHeader()});};var getAdminBoard=function getAdminBoard(){return axios.get(API_URL+"admin",{headers:authHeader()});};export default{getPublicContent:getPublicContent,getUserBoard:getUserBoard,getModeratorBoard:getModeratorBoard,getAdminBoard:getAdminBoard};
